Quickstart

Get started with the Crane API in minutes. Integrate localized Ugandan language models into your applications.

Integration Architecture

Live Sandbox

Enter your API key below to update the snippet instantly. The code uses curl for universality.

(Not saved, local only) 

curl https://api.aistudio.ug/v1/completions \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk-placeholder-key" \
  -d '{
    "model": "crane-v1",
    "prompt": "Translate to Luganda: Hello world",
    "max_tokens": 64
  }'
